pinyin: zai4 sheng1 bu4 liang2 xing4 pin2 xue4

sentences.english: The small chin deformity was a common developmental deformity of the jaw.
sentences.chinese: “地包天”牙是颌骨发育畸形或不良习惯所引起。

sentences.english: It is better to weed out the bad businesses within the group rather than cross-subsidise them to save face.
sentences.chinese: 将集团内的不良业务剔除，好过为了面子予以挽救。

sentences.english: The third part of the study focused on the status of vocational school students bad habits.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分集中考察职校生不良行为习惯的现状。

sentences.english: No data are available to support a correlation between RGV and adverse event rates.
sentences.chinese: 目前尚无数据说明RGV与不良事件率之间的联系。

sentences.english: The doctors tell me that's what has knocked my digestion out being so infernally jealous of her.
sentences.chinese: 医生们说我消化不良就是因为我对她嫉妒得太厉害啦。

sentences.english: Objective: To analyze the adverse reactions of Clindamycin.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析克林霉素的不良反应。

sentences.english: We should get rid of the bad style and keep the good.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该摒弃不良作风，保持优良作风。

sentences.english: Drinking potato juice every day can ease indigestion, a new study has found.
sentences.chinese: 一项新的调查，每天喝土豆汁可以消化不良的症状。

sentences.english: You can’t have good ideas unless you’re willing to generate a lot of bad ones.
sentences.chinese: 除非摒弃诸多不良想法才会有好点子。

sentences.english: Back in the old day, they gave the ill-behaved man a flogging.
sentences.chinese: 过去他们对行为不良的男人，狠狠抽打一顿。

sentences.english: The Justice Department says those dismissals were based on poor performance.
sentences.chinese: 司法部称解雇是由于他们不良的工作表现。

sentences.english: Our dream is to change this bad image.
sentences.chinese: 我们的梦想是扭转这种不良印象。

sentences.english: Conclusion The prognosis of PHT secondary to rheumatic diseases is pessimistic.
sentences.chinese: 结论风湿性疾病继发肺动脉高压预后不良。

sentences.english: Objective To study the poor eyesight situation of the students in the Xingning city and countryside.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解广东省兴宁市城乡中小学生视力不良状况。

sentences.english: This will have an undesirable effect on query optimization.
sentences.chinese: 这对于查询的优化有着不良的影响。

definition: to jeopardize/to harm/to endanger/harmful effect/damage/CL:個|个[ge4]
to induce/to encourage/to provide guidance/(medicine, chemistry) induction
